entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
